title: MangroveFarmer
content:
local turtlePos, direction
local startPos, startDir

local function getGPSPosition()
    local x, y, z = gps.locate()
    if not x then print("Error: GPS not available") return nil end
    return {x = math.floor(x), y = math.floor(y), z = math.floor(z)}
end

local function negative(vec)
    return {x = -vec.x, y = -vec.y, z = -vec.z}
end

local function add(vec1, vec2)
    return {x = vec1.x + vec2.x, y = vec1.y + vec2.y, z = vec1.z + vec2.z}
end
local function sub(vec1, vec2)
    return add(vec1, negative(vec2))
end

local function multiply(s, vec)
    return {x = s * vec.x, y = s * vec.y, z = s * vec.z}
end

local function getSign(number)
    return number / math.abs(number)
end

local function isEqual(vec1, vec2)
    return vec1.x == vec2.x and vec1.y == vec2.y and vec1.z == vec2.z
end


-- === Basic Movement ===

local function moveForward()
    if turtle.forward() then
        turtlePos = add(turtlePos, direction)
        return true
    end
    return false
end
local function moveUp()
    if turtle.up() then
        turtlePos.y = turtlePos.y + 1
        return true
    end
    return false
end

local function moveDown()
    if turtle.down() then
        turtlePos.y = turtlePos.y - 1
        return true
    end
    return false
end

local function forceMoveForward()
    while not moveForward() do turtle.dig() end
end

local function forceMoveUp()
    while not moveUp() do turtle.digUp() end
end

local function forceMoveDown()
    while not moveDown() do turtle.digDown() end
end

-- === Basic Turning ===

local function turnInDirection(dir)
    if not direction then return end
    if dir == "left" then
        turtle.turnLeft()
        direction = {x = direction.z, y = 0, z = -direction.x}
    elseif dir == "right" then
        turtle.turnRight()
        direction = {x = -direction.z, y = 0, z = direction.x}
    elseif dir == "around" then
        turtle.turnLeft()
        turtle.turnLeft()
        direction = {x = -direction.x, y = 0, z = -direction.z}
    end
end

local function getTurnDirection(from, to)
    local function vectorsEqual(a, b)
        return a.x == b.x and a.z == b.z
    end

    if vectorsEqual(from, to) then return nil end
    local left  = {x = from.z, y = 0, z = -from.x}
    local right = {x = -from.z, y = 0, z = from.x}
    local back  = {x = -from.x, y = 0, z = -from.z}
    if vectorsEqual(to, left) then
        return "left"
    elseif vectorsEqual(to, right) then
        return "right"
    elseif vectorsEqual(to, back) then
        return "around"
    else
        error("Invalid target direction")
    end
end

local function getDirection()
    local pos1 = getGPSPosition()
    if not pos1 then error("GPS failure, cannot get direction") end

    for i = 1, 4 do
        if turtle.forward() then
            local pos2 = getGPSPosition()
            if not pos2 then error("GPS failure after move") end
            -- turtlePos = pos2
            -- Richtung berechnen
            direction = sub(pos2, pos1)

            -- zur√ºck zur urspr√ºnglichen Position
            turnInDirection("around")
            forceMoveForward()

            -- Sicherheitspr√ºfung
            local posBack = getGPSPosition()
            if not isEqual(pos1, posBack) then
                error("Warnung: Position hat sich beim R√ºckweg verschoben!")
                turtlePos = posBack -- explizit wieder auf GPS setzen
            else
                turtlePos = pos1
            end

            turnInDirection("around")
            return
        else
            turtle.turnLeft()
        end
    end

    error("Unable to move forward in any direction for direction detection")
end


-- === Positioning ===

local function goToPos(coord)
    local deltaX = coord.x - turtlePos.x
    local deltaY = coord.y - turtlePos.y
    local deltaZ = coord.z - turtlePos.z

    local dirX = startDir.x
    local dirZ = startDir.z

    local function moveToEqualX()
        while not (deltaX == 0) do
            turnInDirection(getTurnDirection(direction, {x = getSign(deltaX), y = 0, z = 0}))
            forceMoveForward()
            deltaX = coord.x - turtlePos.x
        end
    end

    local function moveToEqualZ()
        while not (deltaZ == 0) do
            turnInDirection(getTurnDirection(direction, {x = 0, y = 0, z = getSign(deltaZ)}))
            forceMoveForward()
            deltaZ = coord.z - turtlePos.z
        end
    end

    local function moveToEqualY()
        while not (deltaY == 0) do
            if deltaY > 0 then
                forceMoveUp()
            elseif deltaY < 0 then
                forceMoveDown()
            end
            deltaY = coord.y - turtlePos.y
        end
    end

    
    if dirX == 0 then
        moveToEqualZ()
        moveToEqualX()
    elseif dirZ == 0 then
        moveToEqualX()
        moveToEqualZ()
    end

    if not (deltaY == 0) then
        moveToEqualY()
        deltaX = coord.x - turtlePos.x
        deltaZ = coord.z - turtlePos.z
    end
end

local function goToStartOfTree()
    startTreePos = add(startPos, multiply(7, startDir))
    goToPos(startTreePos)
    turnInDirection(getTurnDirection(direction, startDir))
end

-- === Tasks ===

local function isSapling(item)
    if not item or not item.name then return false end

    local saplingSuffix = "_propagule"
    return item.name:match(":.*" .. saplingSuffix .. "$") ~= nil
end

local function isBoneMeal(item)
    if not item or not item.name then return false end
    return item.name == "minecraft:bone_meal"
end

local function isLog(item)
    if not item or not item.name then return false end

    local logSuffix = "_log"
    return item.name:match(":.*" .. logSuffix .. "$") ~= nil
end

local function getBoneMealCount()
    local num = 0
    for i = 1, 16 do
        local item = turtle.getItemDetail(i)
        
        if isBoneMeal(item) then
            num = num + turtle.getItemCount(i)
        end
    end
    return num
end

local function selectSaplingSlot()
    for i = 1, 16 do
        local item = turtle.getItemDetail(i)
        
        if isSapling(item) then
            turtle.select(i)
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

local function selectBoneMealSlot()
    for i = 1, 16 do
        local item = turtle.getItemDetail(i)
        
        if isBoneMeal(item) then
            turtle.select(i)
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

local function plantSapling()
    if not selectSaplingSlot() then return false end
    if not turtle.place() then return false end
    return true
end

local function fellBranch(bDown)
    -- if turtle goes down the tree
    bDown = bDown or false

    local suc, item = turtle.inspect()
    if not(suc and isLog(item)) then
        return false
    end
    if bDown then
        forceMoveDown()
        fellBranch()
        forceMoveUp()
    end

    branchDir = direction


    forceMoveForward()

    local function advanceInBranch()
        forceMoveForward()
        local suc, item = turtle.inspectUp()
        if suc and isLog(item) then
            forceMoveUp()
            advanceInBranch()
            forceMoveDown()
        end
        turnInDirection(getTurnDirection(direction, negative(branchDir)))
        forceMoveForward()
    end

    advanceInBranch()
    turnInDirection(getTurnDirection(direction, negative(branchDir)))
    forceMoveForward()
    turnInDirection(getTurnDirection(direction, branchDir))
    return true
end

local function fellTree()
    forceMoveForward()

    cnt = 0
    suc, item = turtle.inspectUp()
    while not (suc and isLog(item)) do
        forceMoveUp()
        suc, item = turtle.inspectUp()
        cnt = cnt + 1
        if cnt >= 25 then
            goToStartOfTree()
            return false
        end
    end

    forceMoveUp()
    startLogY = turtlePos.y

    fellBranch()

    suc, item = turtle.inspectUp()
    while suc and isLog(item) do
        forceMoveUp()
        fellBranch()
        suc, item = turtle.inspectUp()
    end

    endLogY = turtlePos.y

    turnInDirection("right")
    fellBranch(true)
    while not (turtlePos.y == startLogY) do
        forceMoveDown()
        fellBranch(true)
    end
    turnInDirection("right")
    fellBranch()
    while not (turtlePos.y == endLogY) do
        forceMoveUp()
        fellBranch()
    end
    turnInDirection("right")
    fellBranch(true)
    while not (turtlePos.y == startLogY) do
        forceMoveDown()
        fellBranch(true)
    end
    goToStartOfTree()

    return true
end



-- === Initialization ===

local function saveStartingParameters()
    local parameterList = {pos = turtlePos, dir = direction}

    local file = fs.open("startingParameters.txt", "w")
    file.write(textutils.serialize(parameterList))
    file.close()
end

local function loadStartingParameters()
    if not fs.exists("startingParameters.txt") then return false end

    local file = fs.open("startingParameters.txt", "r")
    local data = textutils.unserialize(file.readAll())

    file.close()

    startPos = data.pos
    startDir = data.dir
    return true
end

local function initProgram()
    turtlePos = getGPSPosition()
    if not turtlePos then error("GPS failure, cannot run the program") end
    
    getDirection()

    if not loadStartingParameters() then
        startPos = turtlePos
        startDir = direction
        saveStartingParameters()
    end
end



-- === Main ===

local function main()
    initProgram()
    goToStartOfTree()
    fellTree()
end

main()

content:
command -v smartctl >/dev/null || missing="${missing}smartmontools "; command -v dmidecode >/dev/null || missing="${missing}dmidecode"; echo -e '
===== System Information =====
Hostname: '"$(hostname)"'
Uptime: '"$(uptime -p)"'
CPU: '"$(lscpu | awk -F': +' '/Model name/{print $2; exit}')"'
CPU Cores: '"$(nproc)"' ('"$(lscpu | awk -F': +' '/^CPU\(s\):/{print $2}')"' threads)'; if command -v dmidecode >/dev/null 2>&1; then dmi_mem=$(dmidecode -t memory 2>/dev/null); echo "RAM Size: $(echo "$dmi_mem" | awk '/Size: [0-9]+ GB/{s+=$2} /Size: [0-9]+ MB/{s+=$2/1024} END{printf "%.1f GB", s}')"; echo "RAM Type: $(echo "$dmi_mem" | awk -F': +' '/Type: DDR|Type: SDR/{if($2!="Unknown" && $2!=""){print $2; exit}}')"; echo "RAM Speed: $(echo "$dmi_mem" | awk -F': +' '/Speed: [0-9]+ MT/{print $2; exit}')"; echo "RAM ECC: $(echo "$dmi_mem" | awk -F': +' '/Error Correction Type/{if($2=="None")print "Non-ECC";else print "ECC"; exit}')"; echo "Motherboard: $(dmidecode -t baseboard 2>/dev/null | awk -F': +' '/Manufacturer:/{m=$2} /Product Name:/{p=$2} END{print m" "p}')"; else echo "RAM/Motherboard info: dmidecode not installed"; fi; echo -e '
===== GPU Information =====
'"$(lspci | grep -iE 'VGA|Display|3D controller' | grep -iv 'NVMe' | sed 's/^.*: //' || echo "No GPU detected")"'

===== Disk Information =====
'"$(lsblk -bdno NAME,SIZE,ROTA 2>/dev/null | awk 'BEGIN{printf "%-12s %-10s %-8s
","DEVICE","SIZE","TYPE"} {type=($3==1?"HDD":"SSD/NVMe"); printf "%-12s %-10s %-8s
", "/dev/"$1, sprintf("%.1f GB",$2/1000000000), type}')"'

===== Detailed Disk Health & Age ====='; if ! command -v smartctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "smartmontools not installed - disk health data unavailable"; else for d in $(lsblk -dno NAME,TYPE 2>/dev/null | awk '$2~/disk|nvme/{print $1}'); do echo -e "
--- /dev/$d ---"; full_smart=$(smartctl -a /dev/$d 2>/dev/null); model=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk -F': +' '/Device Model|Model Number/{print $2; exit}'); [ -n "$model" ] && echo "Model: $model"; health=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk -F': +' '/SMART overall-health|SMART Health Status/{print $2; exit}'); echo "Health: ${health:-N/A}"; poh=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '/Power_On_Hours|Power On Hours/{print $NF; exit}' | sed 's/,//g'); if [[ "$poh" =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]] && [ "$poh" -gt 0 ]; then echo "$poh" | awk '{gsub(/,/,"",$1); days=int($1/24); years=$1/24/365; printf "Power-On: %s hours (%d days / ~%.1f years)
", $1, days, years}'; fi; pcc=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '/Power_Cycle_Count|Power Cycles/{print $NF; exit}'); [ -n "$pcc" ] && echo "Power Cycles: $(echo $pcc | sed 's/,//g')"; temp=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '/Temperature_Celsius/{print $10; exit} /Temperature:/{print $2; exit}'); [ -n "$temp" ] && echo "Temperature: ${temp}¬∞C"; tbw=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '/Data Units Written/{val=$(NF-1); gsub(/,/,"",val); if(val>0){tb=val*512000/1000000000000; printf "%.2f", tb; exit}}'); if [ -z "$tbw" ] || [ "$tbw" = "0.00" ]; then tbw=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '/Total_LBAs_Written/{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/^[0-9]+$/ && $i>1000){lba=$i; tb=lba*512/1000000000000; printf "%.2f", tb; exit}}}'); fi; if [ -z "$tbw" ] || [ "$tbw" = "0.00" ]; then tbw=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '/Host_Writes|Logical Sectors Written/{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/^[0-9,]+$/ && $i>1000){gsub(/,/,"",$i); val=$i; tb=val*512/1000000000000; printf "%.2f", tb; exit}}}'); fi; [ -n "$tbw" ] && [ "$tbw" != "0.00" ] && echo "Total Written: ${tbw} TB"; wear=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '/Percentage Used/{print $NF; exit}' | sed 's/%//'); [ -n "$wear" ] && echo "Wear Level: ${wear}%"; realloc=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '$2=="Reallocated_Sector_Ct"{print $NF; exit}'); [ -n "$realloc" ] && echo "Reallocated Sectors: $realloc"; pending=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '$2=="Current_Pending_Sector"{print $NF; exit}'); [ -n "$pending" ] && echo "Pending Sectors: $pending"; offline=$(echo "$full_smart" | awk '$2=="Offline_Uncorrectable"{print $NF; exit}'); [ -n "$offline" ] && echo "Offline Uncorrectable: $offline"; done; fi; echo -e '
===== OS Information =====
OS: '"$(cat /etc/os-release 2>/dev/null | awk -F'=' '/^PRETTY_NAME/{gsub(/"/, "", $2); print $2}')"'
Kernel: '"$(uname -r)"'
Architecture: '"$(uname -m)"'
'; if [ -n "$missing" ]; then echo -e "
========================================
WARNING: Missing packages: $missing"; echo "Install with: sudo apt install $missing # Debian/Ubuntu"; echo "         or: sudo dnf install $missing # RHEL/Fedora"; fi

title: MapMaintCode
ShutUp
content:
script_name("Shut Up")
script_author("Maku Kenesu")

require "lib.moonloader"
require "lib.sampfuncs"
local ev = require "lib.samp.events"
local inicfg = require "inicfg"

------------------------------------------------------------
-- BASIC CONFIG
------------------------------------------------------------
local PRIMARY_COLOR = 0xFF5A5A
local LABEL_COLOR = "{FF5A5A}"  -- primary cool red
local ACCENT_COLOR = "{00CED1}" -- accent teal
local label = LABEL_COLOR .. "[Shut Up]{FFFFFF} "
local iniFilePath = "ShutUp.ini"

-- Load or create INI
local config = inicfg.load({
  global = {},
  newbie = {},
  anywhere = {}
}, iniFilePath)

------------------------------------------------------------
-- HELPERS
------------------------------------------------------------
local function saveConfig()
  inicfg.save(config, iniFilePath)
end

-- Ensure the INI file exists on first run
if not doesFileExist(iniFilePath) then
  saveConfig()
end

local function cleanName(name)
  if not name then return "" end
  return name:gsub("_", " "):lower()
end

local function formatName(name)
  return (name:gsub("(%a)([%w_']*)", function(first, rest)
    return first:upper() .. rest:lower()
  end))
end

local function nameInTable(tbl, name)
  local checkName = cleanName(name)
  for _, n in ipairs(tbl) do
    if cleanName(n) == checkName then return true end
  end
  return false
end

local function removeName(tbl, name)
  local checkName = cleanName(name)
  for i, n in ipairs(tbl) do
    if cleanName(n) == checkName then
      table.remove(tbl, i)
      return true
    end
  end
  return false
end

------------------------------------------------------------
-- CHAT FILTER
------------------------------------------------------------
function ev.onServerMessage(color, text)
  for _, n in ipairs(config.anywhere) do
    if text:lower():find(cleanName(n)) then
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "[Blocked Chat Anywhere]: " .. formatName(n), PRIMARY_COLOR)
      return false
    end
  end

  local globalName = text:match("%(%(.-%s([%w_]+%s?[%w_]*)%:%s")
  if globalName and nameInTable(config.global, globalName) then
    sampAddChatMessage(label .. "[Blocked Global Chat]: " .. formatName(globalName), PRIMARY_COLOR)
    return false
  end

  local newbieName = text:match("%*%*%s.-%s([%w_]+%s?[%w_]*)%:%s")
  if newbieName and nameInTable(config.newbie, newbieName) then
    sampAddChatMessage(label .. "[Blocked Newbie Chat]: " .. formatName(newbieName), PRIMARY_COLOR)
    return false
  end
end

------------------------------------------------------------
-- MAIN LOOP / COMMANDS
------------------------------------------------------------
function main()
  while not isSampAvailable() do wait(100) end
  sampAddChatMessage(label .. "loaded. Type /shutup.help for commands.", PRIMARY_COLOR)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("shutup.help", function()
    sampAddChatMessage(LABEL_COLOR .. "====== Shut Up Commands ======", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage(ACCENT_COLOR .. "/shutup.g [Name]{FFFFFF} - Block player's global chat messages", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage(ACCENT_COLOR .. "/shutup.n [Name]{FFFFFF} - Block player's newbie messages", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage(ACCENT_COLOR .. "/shutthefuckup [Name]{FFFFFF} - Block player's chat anywhere", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage(ACCENT_COLOR .. "/noshutup.g [Name]{FFFFFF} - Unblock player's global chat messages", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage(ACCENT_COLOR .. "/noshutup.n [Name]{FFFFFF} - Unblock player's newbie", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage(ACCENT_COLOR .. "/noshutthefuckup [Name]{FFFFFF} - Unblock player's chat anywhere", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage(ACCENT_COLOR .. "/shutup.list{FFFFFF} - Show blocked list", PRIMARY_COLOR)
  end)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("shutup.g", function(param)
    if not param or param == "" then
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Usage: /shutup.g [Name]", PRIMARY_COLOR)
      return
    end
    local cleaned = cleanName(param)
    if not nameInTable(config.global, cleaned) then
      table.insert(config.global, cleaned)
      saveConfig()
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Blocked " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} in global.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    else
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} already blocked in global.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    end
  end)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("shutup.n", function(param)
    if not param or param == "" then
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Usage: /shutup.n [Name]", PRIMARY_COLOR)
      return
    end
    local cleaned = cleanName(param)
    if not nameInTable(config.newbie, cleaned) then
      table.insert(config.newbie, cleaned)
      saveConfig()
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Blocked " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} in newbie.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    else
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} already blocked in newbie.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    end
  end)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("shutthefuckup", function(param)
    if not param or param == "" then
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Usage: /shutup.a [Name]", PRIMARY_COLOR)
      return
    end
    local cleaned = cleanName(param)
    removeName(config.global, cleaned)
    removeName(config.newbie, cleaned)
    if not nameInTable(config.anywhere, cleaned) then
      table.insert(config.anywhere, cleaned)
      saveConfig()
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Blocked " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} everywhere.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    else
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} already blocked everywhere.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    end
  end)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("noshutup.g", function(param)
    local cleaned = cleanName(param)
    if removeName(config.global, cleaned) then
      saveConfig()
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Unblocked " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} from global.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    else
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} not found in global.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    end
  end)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("noshutup.n", function(param)
    local cleaned = cleanName(param)
    if removeName(config.newbie, cleaned) then
      saveConfig()
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Unblocked " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} from newbie.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    else
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} not found in newbie.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    end
  end)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("shutthefuckup", function(param)
    local cleaned = cleanName(param)
    if removeName(config.anywhere, cleaned) then
      saveConfig()
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. "Unblocked " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} from anywhere.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    else
      sampAddChatMessage(label .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatName(cleaned) .. "{FFFFFF} not found in anywhere.", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    end
  end)

  sampRegisterChatCommand("shutup.list", function()
    local function formatList(tbl)
      local arr = {}
      for _, n in ipairs(tbl) do
        table.insert(arr, formatName(n))
      end
      return table.concat(arr, ", ")
    end

    sampAddChatMessage(LABEL_COLOR .. "==== Blocked Names ====", PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage("{FFFFFF}Global: " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatList(config.global), PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage("{FFFFFF}Newbie: " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatList(config.newbie), PRIMARY_COLOR)
    sampAddChatMessage("{FFFFFF}Anywhere: " .. ACCENT_COLOR .. formatList(config.anywhere), PRIMARY_COLOR)
  end)
end

title: MoICyber-1
content:
# –ò–∑–∏—Å–∫–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è: pip install numpy pandas scikit-learn matplotlib
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.datasets import make_classification
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier, plot_tree
from sklearn.metrics import classification_report, confusion_matrix, accuracy_score
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# 1) –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–∞–Ω–µ –Ω–∞ —Å–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ç–∏—á–Ω–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω–∏ (—Å–∏–º—É–ª–∏—Ä–∞—â–∏ –º—Ä–µ–∂–æ–≤–∏ —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫)
# –¢—É–∫ –∏–∑–ø–æ–ª–∑–≤–∞–º–µ make_classification: –≤—Å–µ–∫–∏ —Ä–µ–¥ = —Å–µ—Å–∏—è/–ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç; target = –∫–ª–∞—Å (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä. "–∑–ª–æ–Ω–∞–º–µ—Ä–µ–Ω"/"–Ω–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–µ–Ω")
X, y = make_classification(
    n_samples=2000,       # –±—Ä–æ–π –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä–∏
    n_features=10,        # –æ–±—â –±—Ä–æ–π –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞—Ü–∏ (–º–æ–∂–µ—à –¥–∞ —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–∏—à –ø–æ-–Ω–∞—Ç–∞—Ç—ä–∫)
    n_informative=6,      # –∫–æ–ª–∫–æ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–∫–∞ —Å–∞ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∏ –∑–∞ –∫–ª–∞—Å–∞
    n_redundant=2,        # –ª–∏–Ω–µ–π–Ω–æ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞—Ü–∏
    n_repeated=0,
    n_classes=2,          # –±–∏–Ω–∞—Ä–Ω–∞ –∫–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä 0 = –Ω–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–µ–Ω, 1 = –æ–ø–∞—Å–µ–Ω)
    weights=[0.8, 0.2],   # –ª–µ–∫ –¥–∏—Å–±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å (80% –Ω–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–Ω–∏, 20% –∞—Ç–∞–∫–∏)
    class_sep=1.2,
    random_state=42
)

# 2) –ó–∞—Ä–µ–∂–¥–∞–Ω–µ –≤ DataFrame —á—Ä–µ–∑ pandas
feature_names = [f'feat_{i}' for i in range(X.shape[1])]
df = pd.DataFrame(X, columns=feature_names)
df['label'] = y
print(df.head())

# 3) –†–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—è–Ω–µ –Ω–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤—ä—á–µ–Ω –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä
X = df[feature_names].values
y = df['label'].values
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(
    X, y, test_size=0.3, stratify=y, random_state=42
)

# 4) –ò–∑–ø–æ–ª–∑–≤–∞–Ω–µ –Ω–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω–∏—Ç–µ –∑–∞ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ Decision Tree
clf = DecisionTreeClassifier(
    criterion='gini',
    max_depth=5,        # –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –¥—ä—Ä–≤–æ—Ç–æ; –ø—Ä–æ–±–≤–∞–π —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω–∏ —Å—Ç–æ–π–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
    min_samples_split=10,
    random_state=42
)
clf.fit(X_train, y_train)

# 5) –ù–∞—á–µ—Ä—Ç–∞–≤–∞–Ω–µ –Ω–∞ –¥—ä—Ä–≤–æ—Ç–æ
plt.figure(figsize=(16,8))
plot_tree(clf, feature_names=feature_names, class_names=['normal','attack'], filled=True, fontsize=8)
plt.title("Decision Tree")
plt.show()

# 6) –û—Ü–µ–Ω–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤—è–Ω–µ—Ç–æ –≤—ä—Ä—Ö—É —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–∏—è –º–∞—Å–∏–≤
y_pred = clf.predict(X_test)
print("Accuracy:", accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred))
print("Confusion matrix:\n", confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred))
print("Classification report:\n", classification_report(y_test, y_pred))

# 7) –ü—Ä–æ–±–∞ —Å—ä—Å —Å—ä—â–æ—Ç–æ, –Ω–æ —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–∞–≤–∞–Ω–µ –Ω–∞ –±—Ä–æ—è –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞—Ü–∏
# –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–∞–º–µ –Ω–æ–≤ –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä —Å –ø–æ–≤–µ—á–µ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞—Ü–∏ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä. 30)
X2, y2 = make_classification(
    n_samples=2000,
    n_features=30,
    n_informative=15,
    n_redundant=10,
    n_classes=2,
    weights=[0.8, 0.2],
    class_sep=1.0,
    random_state=1
)
df2 = pd.DataFrame(X2, columns=[f'feat_{i}' for i in range(X2.shape[1])])
df2['label'] = y2

X2 = df2.drop(columns=['label']).values
y2 = df2['label'].values
X2_train, X2_test, y2_train, y2_test = train_test_split(X2, y2, test_size=0.3, stratify=y2, random_state=1)

clf2 = DecisionTreeClassifier(max_depth=6, min_samples_split=10, random_state=1)
clf2.fit(X2_train, y2_train)

y2_pred = clf2.predict(X2_test)
print("With 30 features - Accuracy:", accuracy_score(y2_test, y2_pred))
print("With 30 features - Classification report:\n", classification_report(y2_test, y2_pred))

title: setup-alpine-termux
content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
## SET UP TERMUX TO BOOT INTO ALPINE PROOT
## AUTHOR: ConzZah
## LICENSE: MIT
apt install -y dos2unix; dos2unix $0 && sed -i 5d $0 && exec bash $0 ## <-- this line will commit sudoku
## backup .profile, should it exist, so we don't delete anything
[ -f .profile ] && [ ! -f .profile_bak ] && mv .profile .profile_bak
echo 'proot-distro login alpine' > .profile
apt update; apt upgrade -y
! command -v proot-distro >/dev/null && \
apt install -y proot-distro
proot-distro install alpine && \
echo 'INSTALL SUCCESSFUL'
## change login shell to bash and install basic packages
proot-distro login alpine -- apk add curl git bash shadow fastfetch 
proot-distro login alpine -- chsh -s /bin/bash root >/dev/null
proot-distro login alpine -- fastfetch
proot-distro login alpine

title: salesforce oa 3rd nov
content:
'''
given you arr1 and arr2
you can do m operations
in each operation from front or back of arr2 pick an element and put it in front or back of arr1
by doing these m operations find out the max subarray sum possible


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

important thing to be noted here is

lets focus on how we can pick out m elements
place 2 pointers at start and end of arr2 and pick out m elements with m comparisions
once you have popped out m max elements from front or back of the arr2
you need to filter out positive elements from them and form a good sum
say in this way you got a good sum 20
now say you were given an array
5 -100 10
you have 2 choices as per question you can put all of those postive (good sum)
either at front or back ,you need to try to get the ans as 30 not settle for 25
so the answer would be max(max kadane with goodsum at front ,max kadane with goodsum at back)



'''

class Solution:

    def maxSubArraySumWithMops(self,arr1,arr2,m):
        #m will be always <= len(arr2)
        left = 0 
        right = len(arr2)-1
        maxArr2 = []
        goodSum = 0

        while m and left<=right:
            if arr2[left]>arr2[right]:
                maxArr2.append(arr2[left])
                left += 1
            else:
                maxArr2.append(arr2[right])
                right -= 1
            m-=1
            
        for ele in maxArr2:
            if ele>0:
                goodSum+=ele 
        
        temp1 = [ele for ele in arr1]
        temp2 = [ele for ele in arr1]
        temp1.insert(goodSum,0)
        temp2.append(goodSum)
        maxi = -10**10
        print(f"goodsum is {goodSum}")
        #finding kadane when goodsum placed at left
        prev = -10**10
        for ele in temp1:
            prev = max(prev+ele,ele,0)
            maxi = max(maxi,prev)
             

        #finding kadane when goodsum placed at right
        prev = -10**10
        for ele in temp2:
            prev = max(prev+ele,ele,0)
            maxi = max(maxi,prev)




        return maxi
        
       

if __name__ == "__main__":
    sol = Solution()

    # Each test case is (arr1, arr2, m)
    test_cases = [
        ([1,3,-5,2,2], [2,3], 2),
        ([5, -100, 10], [10,10,10], 2),                # example from description
        ([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], 3),                       # all positive, pick all
        ([10, -5, 7], [-1, -2, -3], 2),                  # arr2 all negative
        ([1, 2, 3, 4], [5, 6, 7, 8], 1),                 # pick one from arr2
        ([0, 0, 0], [1, 2, 3], 2),                       # arr1 zeros
        ([1], [2], 1),                                   # single element each
        ([1, -2, 3], [4, -5, 6], 2),                     # mixed arr2
        ([1, 2, 3], [], 0),                              # arr2 empty, no ops
        ([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], 0),                       # m=0, no ops
        ([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], 10),                      # m > len(arr2)
    ]

    for idx, (arr1, arr2, m) in enumerate(test_cases, start=1):
        try:
            result = sol.maxSubArraySumWithMops(list(arr1), list(arr2), m)
        except Exception as e:
            result = f"Error: {e}"
        print(f"Test case {idx}: arr1={arr1} arr2={arr2} m={m} -> Result: {result}")
